lexUnit.name: remedy.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a medicine or treatment for a disease or injury

sentence.text: His own knowledge of dissection also paid dividends , allowing him to concoct remedies against rheumatism made from the fat of his hanged victims .
Ground elder is said to have been brought to Britain by the Romans as a remedy for gout and has plagued us ever since .
A remedy for economic ills is suggested .
